title: Tonari no Koakuma Boy
sinopse:
Seiji, the younger one, and Ai, two childhood friends, happen to live together. Ai has an omamori to get a boyfriend. She thinks she wants 'a very loving but cheeky boy.' But when she accidentally witnesses Seiji's date and kiss, her heart starts hurting. Why...?

(Source: Shoujo Crusade)
